org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api

Interface PackageGenerator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PackageGenerationService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicPackageGenerationService, BOREMPackageGenerator, TestPackageGenerator

    public interface PackageGenerator
    This is the format-specific package generator.

    Given a PackageState describing package contents, the role of the PackageGenerator is to produce an appropriate serialized package in some format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Package generatePackage(PackageState packageState, PackageGenerationParameters params)
      Generate a package based upon the content specified in the PackageState.

    • Method Detail

      • generatePackage

        Package generatePackage(PackageState packageState,
                        PackageGenerationParameters params)
        Generate a package based upon the content specified in the PackageState.
        Parameters:
        packageState - a state object containing information about the package and its custodial content
        params - Package Generation parameters used in generating the package.
        Returns:
        the package
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is a problem generating the package.
